articles.description: B12 IS a water-soluble nutrient essential for the nervous system and neurological function. Suboptimal levels can give rise to myriad complications ranging from neurological difficulties to poor coordination. The body's extremities are often one of the first …

articles.author: Joel Day
articles.title: Alzheimer's breakthrough after study suggests one vitamin 'could protect' against disease - Daily Express
articles.description: ALZHEIMER'S researchers made a potential breakthrough after finding high levels of vitamin B12 could prevent damage caused by the disease.
